CREATE FUNCTION `wp_erpc_do_lock`(`name` VARCHAR(100), `timeout` INT, `owner` INT) RETURNS int(11) BEGIN SET @lck_name = 'erpc_lck'; SET @lck_result = 0; SET @result = 0; SELECT GET_LOCK(@lck_name, 10) INTO @lck_result; IF @lck_result = 1 THEN DELETE FROM wp_erpc_locks WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, lock_time, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) >= lock_timeout; SELECT 0 INTO @lck_result FROM wp_erpc_locks WHERE lock_name = name; IF @lck_result = 1 THEN INSERT INTO `wp_erpc_locks`(`lock_name`, `lock_timeout`, `lock_owner`) VALUES (name, timeout, owner); SET @result = 1; END IF; SELECT RELEASE_LOCK(@lck_name) INTO @lck_result; END IF; RETURN @result; END
